snippet: Questions about the bridle path along Ocean Parkway in Brooklyn, and feeding the squirrels in New York’s parks.
abstract: Michael Pollak FYI column answers questions about former bridal path near Ocean Parkway in Brooklyn and whether it is legal to feed squirrels in NYC parks.
lead_paragraph: Questions about the bridle path along Ocean Parkway in Brooklyn, and feeding the squirrels in New York’s parks.

headline.main: Answers to Questions About New York
